Package kchandra423.actors.weapons.projectiles

Class Projectile

java.lang.Object
kchandra423.actors.Actor
kchandra423.actors.weapons.projectiles.Projectile
public class Projectile extends Actor
Represents any sort of projectile that moves in a specified direction every frame
Author:
Kumar Chandra
See Also:

    • Projectile

      public Projectile​(KImage image, float v, float angle, boolean ally)
      Creates a new Projectile with the specified image, and initial velocity and angle
      Parameters:
      image - The specified image
      v - The initial velocity of this projectile
      angle - The initial angle of this projectile
      ally - Whether or not this projectile belongs to an ally
